function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clean water and sanitation leading to the presence of intestinal parasitic diseases","Impact":"Spread of multiple infectious diseases, impacting the health of the community","Mitigation":"Implementing clean water and sanitation infrastructure, and promoting hygiene education","Technologies":"Water filtration systems, sanitation facilities, educational campaigns","People":"Community members in villages, especially those in underprivileged areas","Owner":"Local government, NGOs, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Neglect of co-infection in disease control and epidemiological modeling","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of disease interactions and their impact on public health and climate change","Mitigation":"Conducting research and development on co-infection, integrating co-infection into epidemiological models","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation software, research funding for co-infection studies","People":"Epidemiological modeling community, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Underfunded health systems and ineffective health governance structures","Impact":"Inadequate control and mitigation of vector-borne diseases (VBDs), potentially leading to continued spread and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Strengthening health systems, improving health governance, and increasing funding for public health initiatives","Technologies":"Health information systems, data analysis tools, financial management systems for health organizations","People":"Communities with inadequate health systems, public health organizations","Owner":"Government health agencies, international health organizations"}]}
